name: rentrider
description: Bike rental platform with customer, owner, and admin interfaces

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server:dev" "npm run client:dev" "npm run admin:dev"
scripts.server:dev: cd server && set HOST=0.0.0.0&& set PORT=5001&& npm run dev
scripts.client:dev: cd client && set HOST=0.0.0.0&& npm start
scripts.admin:dev: cd admin-panel && set HOST=0.0.0.0&& npm start
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../admin-panel && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../admin-panel && npm run build
scripts.setup:env: echo 'Please update .env files with your MongoDB Atlas and Firebase credentials'
scripts.test:connection: cd server && node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const mongoose = require('mongoose'); mongoose.connect(process.env.MONGODB_URI).then(() => console.log('✅ Atlas connection successful')).catch(err => console.error('❌ Atlas connection failed:', err));"
scripts.setup:firebase: echo 'Follow FIREBASE_MONGODB_SETUP.md for complete setup instructions'
scripts.setup:complete: npm run install:all && npm run setup:env && npm run setup:firebase
